citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:20 pm on
03/22/2016.
The inspector arrived at the facility at 1:20 pm and knocked on the door, called the provided phone number and left
a message. The inspector waited for thirty minutes and then left the facility.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:20 pm on
03/22/2016.
The inspector arrived at the facility at 1:20 pm and knocked on the door, called the provided phone number and left
a message.  The inspector waited for thirty minutes and then left the facility.
